Name: team_must_have_size_limit
Description: A team should not exceed the maximum size for efficiency.

Name: feature_estimated_effort_within_range
Description: Feature estimated effort must be within acceptable limits to ensure feasibility.

Name: sprint_end_date_must_be_achieved
Description: Sprints should meet their end dates as planned for time management.

Name: no_open_blockers_before_release
Description: There must be no open blockers before a release to ensure smooth deployment.

Name: task_completion_within_sprint
Description: All tasks in a sprint backlog should be completed within the sprint duration.

Name: user_stories_must_have_criteria
Description: User stories must have clear acceptance criteria for development clarity.

Name: release_plan_status_approved
Description: A release plan must be approved before execution to ensure readiness.

Name: product_backlog_must_be_updated
Description: Frequent updates on the product backlog are required for agile responsiveness.

Name: sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Achievement of sprint goals must be tracked and met to ensure progress.

Name: team_location_consistency
Description: Teams should consistently work from their designated location for stability.
